input_tiff.title: Select Image
input_tiff.description: Image in TIFF format used as input for StarDist segmentation.

minPercentileNormalization.title: Minimum percentile for normalization
minPercentileNormalization.description: Pixels falling below this intensity threshold will be ignored during normalization prior to segmentation (0-100)

maxPercentileNormalization.title: Maximum percentile for normalization
maxPercentileNormalization.description: Pixels falling above this intensity threshold will be ignored during normalization prior to segmentation (0-100)

threshold.title: Probability (detection) threshold
threshold.description: Lower values (ranging from 0-1) will result in more cells being detected

channels.title: Detection Channel
channels.description: Color channel containing information used to detect cells

cellExpansion.title: Approximate cells based upon nucleus expansion

cellConstrainScale.title: Constrain cell expansion using nucleus size

cluster_by.title: Cluster By
cluster_by.description: Select the measurement used to cluster cells

scaling.title: Scaling Method
scaling.description: Transformation method for scaling data (robust: median +/- interquartile range, zscore: mean +/- standard deviation, minmax: min-max normalization, none: no scaling)
